function getDrawInfo(uint256 drawId) view returns (string drawNumber, uint64 scheduledTime, uint8 status, uint16 winningNumber, uint256 totalBetAmount, uint256 totalPaidOut, uint32 betCount, uint32 resolvedCount)
function getDrawBet(uint256 drawId, uint256 betIndex) view returns (address user, uint128 amount, uint128 payout, uint8 betType, uint16 betNumber, uint8 status)
function getNumberExposure(uint256 drawId, uint8 betType, uint16 betNumber) view returns (uint256)
function getMultipliers() view returns (uint32 fijo, uint32 centena, uint32 parle)
function getLimits() view returns (uint256 minBet, uint256 maxBet, uint256 currentMaxPerNumber, uint256 pool)
function numberExposure(uint256, uint8, uint16) view returns (uint256)
function placeBet(uint256 drawId, uint8 betType, uint16 betNumber, uint128 amount)
function placeBetsBatch(uint256 drawId, tuple(uint8 betType, uint16 betNumber, uint128 amount)[] betsInput)
function createDraw(string drawNumber, uint64 scheduledTime) returns (uint256 drawId)
function setMultipliers(uint32 fijo, uint32 centena, uint32 parle)
event DrawCreated(uint256 indexed drawId, string drawNumber, uint64 scheduledTime)
event VRFRequested(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 vrfRequestId)
event WinningNumberSet(uint256 indexed drawId, uint16 winningNumber)
event DrawResolved(uint256 indexed drawId, uint16 winningNumber, uint256 totalPaidOut)
event DrawCancelled(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 refundedAmount)
event BetPlaced(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 betIndex, address indexed user, uint8 betType, uint16 betNumber, uint256 amount)
event BetPaid(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 betIndex, address indexed user, uint256 payout)
event BetUnpaid(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 betIndex, uint256 payoutNeeded, uint256 poolAvailable)
event BetRefunded(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 betIndex, address indexed user, uint256 amount)
event BetRetryPaid(uint256 indexed drawId, uint256 betIndex, address indexed user, uint256 payout)
event PoolFunded(address indexed from, uint256 amount)
